data.title: She Has a Name by Andrew Kooman
data.meta_description: In She Has A Name, a young lawyer poses as a john to build a legal case against a brothel trafficking young girls from Malaysia to Thailand. His investigation centers on Number 18, a young Cambodian girl working in a Bangkok brothel, whose testimony could make or break the case. The play is haunted by Voices who usher Number 18 to her fate. Year Printed: 2013 First Produced: In 2011 at Motel Theatre - The Epcor Centre, Calgary, AB. Running TIme: 90 minutes Acts: 2 Male Cast: 2 Female Cast: 8 Total Cast: 10 Note: 5 actors can play a total of 10 roles. Visit: www.shehasaname.net
data.text:
In She Has A Name, a young lawyer poses as a john to build a legal case against a brothel trafficking young girls from Malaysia to Thailand. His investigation centers on Number 18, a young Cambodian girl working in a Bangkok brothel, whose testimony could make or break the case. The play is haunted by Voices who usher Number 18 to her fate.

Year Printed: 2013

First Produced: In 2011 at Motel Theatre - The Epcor Centre, Calgary, AB.

Running TIme: 90 minutes

Acts: 2

Male Cast: 2

Female Cast: 8

Total Cast: 10

Note: 5 actors can play a total of 10 roles.

Visit: www.shehasaname.net
